means.word_mean: 1. extension upward of the toes when the sole of the foot is stroked firmly on the outer side from the heel to the front; normal in infants under the age of two years but a sign of brain or spinal cord injury in older persons

auth_sentence.content: My favorite cookbook is the "Gastronomie Practique," by Henri Babinski, who was a bourgeois chef in France in the last century.
